code: import React from"react";import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css';import'../style.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Index(){const[BackendData,setBackendData]=useState([{}]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("/images").then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setBackendData(data);});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"gallery",children:BackendData.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"gallery-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item["link"],alt:item["alt"],width:item["width"],height:item["height"],className:"figure-img img-fluid"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("figcaption",{className:"figure-caption",children:item["alt"]})]}))});}export default Index;
